import React , {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import NavBar from "../NavBar/NavBar"; import style from "./newRecipe.module.css"; import { getDiets } from "../../Redux/actions/actions"; import { useDispatch,useSelector } from "react-redux"; function NewRecipe(){ const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getDiets()) },[dispatch]) const diets = useState(state=> state.diets); console.log(diets) return (
